DOC.brief_summary: This quantitative study aimed to evaluate the respiratory muscle strength, pulmonary function, cardiovascular function, and impact on quality of life in patients after cardiac rehabilitation associated with the diaphragmatic muscle training.
DOC.criteria: Clinical diagnosis of Cardiomyopathies in functional class III or IV (New York Heart Association) Aged over 18 years Body mass index below 30 kg/m2 Confused and depressed patients Cardiac instability and worsening dyspnea after initiation of treatment
